metadata.title: CVE-2023-7216 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A path traversal vulnerability was found in the CPIO utility. This issuecould allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to trick a user into openinga specially crafted archive. During the extraction process, the archivercould follow symlinks outside of the intended directory, which could beutilized to run arbitrary commands on the target system.

criterions.comment: cpio package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
